Pre-Game Insights: New Zealand will face Australia in the first T20I on Wednesday.
Mitchell Marsh will lead Australia despite the return of seamer Pat Cummins, while Mitchell Santner will captain New Zealand.
Regular captain Kane Williamson will miss the series expecting the birth of his third child.
New Zealand will also miss all-rounder Daryl Mitchell owing to an injury.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The New Zealand vs Australia T20Is will be live-streamed on Amazon Prime.
There will be no broadcast for the Australia vs New Zealand T20Is in India.
Others: Australia enter the series after a 2-1 T20I series win at home against the West Indies.
Meanwhile, New Zealand routed Pakistan in their previous T20I series by a 4-1 margin.
